I thought it was already over back then..

Later Mika and her boyfriend invite MC to a love hotel (they were planning to go themselves anyways) and Mika's boyfriend wants to compare sizes with MC. Then Mika's boyfriend ends up just letting MC take turns and do it with Mika since "it makes her happy / feel good". So the NTR setup is there with the changing room and MC getting to do it last in front of the boyfriend, but overall the NTR feels not as strong compared to the other parts with Junsuke getting cucked. 

On a side note the author seems to have changed his drawing style again and the eyes of the women look a lil weird in this Part, wish he kept it the same as the previous Part 3

Other story notes: Blond handsome guy is Mika's first boyfriend / partner ever. After she found out his past partner count (number is hidden but implied to be a ridiculous figure) she decided that she needed to match his level of experiences in order to be "deserving of him" and shortly after met MC in Sex Friend Part 1. 

In the first section of Part 5, Ayano wants MC to "attack" Mika in the clothing store which MC interprets as doing it doggy style (Ayano actually just wanted MC to surprise Mika). Later in the park Mika decides to get revenge by calling out Ayano & MC hiding in the bushes and tells her boyfriend that she wanted to introduce this couple to him, and that this couple has no shame in kissing - confessing their love to each other while in public in front of other people. MC goes along with it, and when Ayano says "I love you", MC gets triggered and they start doing it on the bench
If what @Lesexgod says is true then I hope Ayano gets impregnated by the MC and finds out and then leaves Junsuke.

At the end Ayano and Junsuke have "postponed" their engagement (the latter wants to keep fooling around more before marriage) when you see Ayano upset at the table with MC & Mika - which will lead perfectly into Part 5 which has the 3-some with MC, Ayano and Mika (Author states in the afternote that Part 5 and the 3P is coming next)
My favourite series, hoping for more!

Throughout the whole series, I was focusing on the relationship between MC and Ayano (that is my main interest in this series) and Mika would've been that sidekick to help MC conquer her. This part, focusing on Mika and her BF, felt pretty mild thou we got that 3P mmf scene which I felt MC was kinda being sidelined a bit even though he still got the best "performance". Looks like author will make part 5 if sales are good obviously but yea that's another 6+ months of waiting. Alright, translation team let's hit the books, I wanna read this shit! :D

From just looking: looks like MC is out with Ayano (date?, iono). Coincidentally, see Mika and her highly probable BF (mentioned in part 1). MC seems to get surprised/jealous, follows them and does it "NTR" style in the changing room.  Somehow, he runs off back to Ayano, and then it looks like Mika sees the two of them and calls them out. Mika probably refers to them as lovers and for some reason they do public sex and Mika/bf do it too. Finish and Ayano goes off. Then, the 3 of them go to a love hotel and do a 3P, ending with MC finishing inside Mika via ripped condom. Not sure what "happens" after. Seems to be some girl talk and Ayano BF screwing up while she tells the story to Mika/MC.

Note for those that forgot part of the plot:
The new guy is the boyfriend of Mika (Blond girl) has being telling us since SF1 (which is very good at bed and kinky, but it seems our mc remains the best). I can relate to MC feeling jealous of only being a sex-friend currently.
